text: Such an enjoyable ride, no wonder I could replay this game yearly. We really need a direct sequel to this game in the same style, with the return of Smithy (and Geno!). To me, this game still has one of the most unique atmospheres and it's a big reason why I keep going back to it.
author: SupraDarky

text:
I couldn't agree more. Yes, the Mario & Luigi series is pretty good, but the Seven Star world is far too amazing to be a one-shot. Mallow and Geno were beyond solid characters, and the whole thing was stellar. 

But I'd like to believe that seeing Cloud in Smash Bros. 4 means the dream is still more than alive.
author: Madman Asa

text: This game and this EPIC boss theme are so underrated!

text: Man this was such a memorable RPG for a multitude of aspects. From the environment, characters, designs, story and plot points, the personality, style and let's not forget about the music! Yeah, this is an RPG I can never get tired over. Just love experiencing this wonferful gem over and over again.

text: Yoko Shimomura is such an amazing composer, and I love her work so much. I've sadly never beaten this game, but I most definitely need to. I have it for Virtual Console on the Wii, so I guess there's no excuse for not doing so.
